info.author: Marco Haase
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
Frog is a single module based on Tkinter used for graphical programming similar
to what is known as "turtle graphics". Indeed, frog is much more than turtle
graphics: It is an object-oriented, event-driven and powerful module suitable
for educational purpose, but also for programming (some kind of) games.
Works fine with Python 3.x.
info.name: frog
info.summary: Improved and extended turtle graphics like module
info.html_description: Frog is a single module based on Tkinter used for graphical programming similar to what is known as “turtle graphics”. Indeed, frog is much more than turtle graphics: It is an object-oriented, event-driven and powerful module suitable for educational purpose, but also for programming (some kind of) games. Works fine with Python 3.x.
